name: Savage Attacker
description: Once per turn when you roll damage, you can reroll the weapon's damage dice and use either total.

name: Weapon Master
description: Before making an attack, you can choose to take a penalty to your attack roll equal to your level in order to add damage to your damage roll equal to twice your level.

name: Brutal Critical
description: You can roll one additional damage die when determining the extra damage for a critical hit

name: Accuracy
description: Whenever you have advantage on an attack roll, you can reroll one of the dice once.

name: Frenzy
description: When you score a critical hit or reduce a creature to 0 hit points, you can make one attack as a bonus action.
